long_description: The SPIbelt Dual-Pocket runner's belt incudes 2 zippered pockets that a expand to hold your cell phone, credit card, house key and more. Wear the Dual-Pocket belt while you're running, biking, walking, traveling and trekking. Stretchy belt adjusts to fit waists measuring 24 - 40+ in. Plastic side-release buckle allows easy on and off.
short_description: The SPIbelt Dual-Pocket runner's belt incudes 2 zippered pockets that a expand to hold your cell phone, credit card, house key and more.
